name: Roll Ranger
description:
Roll through various augments to conquer waves of enemies!

Each pair of augments will buff both you and the enemies: choose wisely!

Made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls:

WASD to move

E to auto-fire

esc to pause


Credits:

Programming - Harold

Art - Harold and Amanda

Testing - Samuel

Sound Effects - Harold

Music:

"Nightdreams" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
